definition: to suggest (rather than depict in detail)/freehand style of Chinese painting, characterized by bold strokes rather than accurate details
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]
freehand drawing or painting in traditional Chinese style

sentences.english: Now it suggests care, leisure, individuality and beauty.
sentences.chinese: 現在這詞卻象徵着關愛，寫意，獨創以及美。
寫意出一首首寂寞的歌。

sentences.english: A road, a very beautiful very enjoyable moonlight, accompany.
sentences.chinese: 一路，有很唯美很寫意的月光，陪伴。

sentences.english: A typical case is in Chinese free sketch painting.
sentences.chinese: 中國寫意畫是“筆減而意繁”的典型個案。

sentences.english: After the Song Dynasty, literati painting, which emphasizes on conception comes up.
sentences.chinese: 宋元以後，文人畫興起，崇尚寫意。

sentences.english: It resembles the freehand traditional Chinese painting and also shows the delicacy of the linear sketch.
sentences.chinese: 既似國畫大寫意之手法，又似工筆素描之纖細。

sentences.english: Xu Wei's use of ink freehand method, with distinct and individual subjectivity.
sentences.chinese: 徐渭運用潑墨寫意法，具有鮮明的主體性和個性化。

sentences.english: Moreover, poetry and calligraphy have played an important role in the development of it.
sentences.chinese: 詩歌與書法對寫意畫的產生髮展過程起了重要作用。

sentences.english: Experience in freehand and computer graphics essential and able to work with colors.
sentences.chinese: 在寫意和計算機圖形經驗至關重要，能夠與顏色。

sentences.english: Whether in their meals or in doing business, the Spaniards possess a leisurely attitude.
sentences.chinese: 西班牙人不管用餐或做生意都是一番寫意的態度。

sentences.english: They create them personally for self-entertainment, or as presents for relatives.
sentences.chinese: 他們親自奏刀創作，寄情寫意，聊以自娛，饋贈親友。

sentences.english: Xu Wei's"freehand ink"painting techniques for the bird, spectacular dreams of.
sentences.chinese: 徐渭的潑墨寫意花鳥畫，別開生面自成一家。

sentences.english: Liu Dawei is a versatile artists, re-color and fine brushwork and freehand fine ink.
sentences.chinese: 劉大爲是全能型畫家，工筆重彩和水墨寫意兼精。

sentences.english: Enjoyable fairyland, poetic sentiment bonsai, Chinese scenery name card, world geology park.
sentences.chinese: 寫意仙境，詩意盆景，中國山水名片，世界地質公園。

sentences.english: Freehand creations are good for stones and natural looking surfaces.
sentences.chinese: 寫意創作是自然的石塊和良好的表面。

sentences.english: Sherman Lin is fond of freehand abstract paintings.
sentences.chinese: 林學明畫的是抽象寫意繪畫。

definition: brush stroke in Chinese painting and calligraphy/brushwork/style of drawing or writing
line (in drawing, calligraphy etc)/the lines or contours of a three-dimensional object (hairstyle, clothing, car etc)
to create/to produce/to write/creative work/creation/CL:個|个[ge4]
to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]
